channel.title: Eclipse 639 help?
channel.description:
Im trying to learn the newer RSPS before i make my own and decided to use Eclipse, except i cannot get the runserver to work
[code] @echo off title Eclipse 639 "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jdk1.6.0_30/bin/javac.exe" -server -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/* org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap pause [/code]
Thats the run server.
javac: invalid flag: -Xmx512m Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .
Thats the error.
Anyone gotten this server to work?

item.title: Eclipse 639 help?
item.dc:creator: @laakerules laakerules
item.description:
@laakerules wrote:

Im trying to learn the newer RSPS before i make my own and decided to use Eclipse, except i cannot get the runserver to work

@echo off
title Eclipse 639
"C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jdk1.6.0_30/bin/javac.exe" -server -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/* org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap
pause

Thats the run server.

javac: invalid flag: -Xmx512m
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
Press any key to continue . . .

Thats the error.

Anyone gotten this server to work?
